description.message: De meest populaire Chrome-extensie, met meer dan 40 miljoen gebruikers! Blokkeert advertenties op het hele internet.
description.description: Extension description in manifest. Should not exceed 132 characters.

description2.message: De meest populaire Chrome-extensie, met meer dan 40 miljoen gebruikers! Blokkeert advertenties op het hele internet.
description2.description: Extension description in manifest. Should not exceed 132 characters.

description_edge.message: AdBlock. De #1 adblocker met meer dan 200 miljoen downloads. Blokkeert advertenties op het hele internet.
description_edge.description: Description for the AdBlock for Edge extension. Should not exceed 132 characters.

description_yt.message: De enige adblocker voor YouTube™, ontwikkeld door AdBlock, de meest populaire Chrome-extensie met 60 miljoen gebruikers wereldwijd
description_yt.description: Description for the AdBlock on YouTube extension. Should not exceed 132 characters.

name_adblock_on_youtube.description: Name of version of the AdBlock extension that only blocks ads on YouTube. Other strings that refer to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension should use this name.

adblock_click_for_details.description: Tooltip on the AdBlock button, to help users understand that they can click the button to access more options.

reportpubliclyavailable.message: Let op: uw rapport kan openbaar worden gemaakt. Denk hieraan voordat u persoonlijke informatie bijvoegt.
reportpubliclyavailable.description: Ad report page string, when you're about to submit a report.

optionstitle_yt.description: Title for the Options page for the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

chromebutton_how_to_hide2.message: Klik met de rechtermuisknop op de AdBlock-knop en selecteer ‘Verbergen in Chrome-menu’. Zichtbaar maken: klik in het Chrome-menu met de rechtermuisknop op de AdBlock-knop en selecteer ‘In werkbalk houden’.
chromebutton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Hide Button' should match the text that Chrome displays when you right click a toolbar button.

operabutton_how_to_hide2.message: De knop verbergen: ga naar opera://extensions en selecteer de optie ‘Verbergen van knoppenbalk’. U kunt de knop weer zichtbaar maken door deze optie uit te vinken.
operabutton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Hide Button' should match the text that Opera displays on the Extensions page.

safaributton_how_to_hide2.message: De knop verbergen: klik met de rechtermuisknop op de Safari-werkbalk, kies Pas knoppenbalk aan en sleep daarna de AdBlock-knop uit de knoppenbalk. U kunt de knop weer zichtbaar maken door deze naar de werkbalk terug te slepen.
safaributton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Customize Toolbar' should match the text that Safari displays in the toolbar's context menu.

ff_button_how_to_hide.message: De knop verbergen: klik met de rechtermuisknop op de knop en kies Verwijderen van werkbalk. U kunt de knop weer zichtbaar maken via het Firefox-menu -> Aanpassen.
ff_button_how_to_hide.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Remove from Toolbar' should match the text that Firefox displays when you right click a toolbar button, and 'Customize' should match the text that shows when you click the button on the Firefox toolbar with three lines.

sliderexplanation.message: Verplaats de schuifbalk tot de advertentie is verdwenen en het geblokkeerde element bruikbaar lijkt.

slidertitle.message: Stap 1: uitzoeken wat moet worden geblokkeerd

blacklisteroptions1.message: Welke kenmerken van deze advertentie gelden er bij elk bezoek aan deze pagina?
blacklisteroptions1.description: 'Block an ad' wizard attribute choice page

blacklisternotsure.message: Niet zeker? Klik dan gewoon hieronder op ‘Blokkeren!’.
blacklisternotsure.description: 'Block an ad' wizard attribute choice page

blacklisterthefilter.message: Het filter, dat op de pagina Opties kan worden gewijzigd:
blacklisterthefilter.description: 'Block an ad' wizard attribute choice page

blacklisteroptionstitle.message: Laatste stap: waarom is dit een advertentie?

blacklisternofilter.description: Warning if the user hasn't specified a filter

blacklistereditfilter.message: Typ hieronder de naam van het juiste filter en klik op OK
blacklistereditfilter.description: Text if the user wants to manually edit a filter. 'OK' is the standard JavaScript popup button text.

blacklistereditinvalid1.description: Alert if the manually edited filter is invalid. Error messages are not translated.

blacklisterblockedelement.description: Tells the user what the blocked element is on the 'Block an ad' wizard.

blacklisterwarningnofilter.description: Warns the user that nothing will be blocked.

blacklisterblocksalloftype.message: Let op: dit filter blokkeert alle $elementtype$-elementen op de pagina!
blacklisterblocksalloftype.description: Warns the user that all elements of type X will be blocked.

blacklistersinglematch.message: Dat geldt voor 1 item op deze pagina.
blacklistersinglematch.description: Tells the user only one match was found

blacklistermatches.message: Dat geldt voor $matchcount$ items op deze pagina.
blacklistermatches.description: Tells the user multiple matches were found

blacklisterattrwillbe.description: Checkbox label for attributes in 'Block an ad' wizard.

buttonlooksgood.description: Confirmation button after user chose what to block on the page

findingads.message:
Advertenties zoeken...

Dit duurt maar even.

blockanadtitle.description: Title of the first two dialogs of the 'Block an ad' wizard

clickthead.message: Klik op de advertentie, en ik zal u helpen deze te blokkeren.
clickthead.description: User has to click the ad they want to block.

adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.message: AdBlock zal niets doen op pagina’s die voldoen aan:
adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.description: Message displayed when the whitelist wizard will whitelist part of an entire website, for example '*.google.com/reader/*'.  The URL will appear on the next line.

you_can_slide_to_change.message: Versleep de balk hieronder om aan te geven op welke pagina’s AdBlock niets moet doen.
you_can_slide_to_change.description: Whitelist slider usage instructions. Sometimes only one slider will show, and sometimes two will show, and if possible the text should handle both cases.

whitelistertitle2.description: The title of the whitelist wizard (Don't run on this page/pages on this domain)

buttonexclude.description: Button for excluding a domain in the whitelist wizard

wizardcantrunonframesets.message: Deze AdBlock-functie werkt niet op deze website, omdat deze verouderde technologie gebruikt. U kunt items op deze website handmatig blokkeren of toestaan in het menu ‘Aanpassen’ op de optiespagina.
wizardcantrunonframesets.description: Alert shown when the user tries to use a blacklist/whitelist wizard on an old website

subscribeconfirm.message: Weet u zeker dat u zich op de filterlijst $title$ wilt abonneren?
subscribeconfirm.description: Prompt question before subscribing to a filter list

tabgeneral.description: A tab on the Options page

tabfilterlists.description: A tab on the Options page

tabcustomize.description: A tab on the Options page

generaloptions.description: Title of the first Options page tab

betalabel.description: Label for experimental features in AdBlock Options

showcontextmenus2.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page.

safaricontentblocking.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page. 'Content Blocking' is the name of a different way of blocking resources introduced in Safari 9.

debuginlogoption.message: Debugresultaten in de Console-logs tonen (dit vertraagt AdBlock)
debuginlogoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

datacollectionoption.message: AdBlock toestaan om anonieme gebruiksgegevens over filterlijsten en hierdoor geblokkeerde inhoud te verzamelen
datacollectionoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

unsubscribedlabel.description: Status label when unselecting a filter list

fetchinglabel.description: Status label when selecting a new filter list

ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_inv.description: Filter lists tab of the Options page: Message when you subscribe to a non-list URL.

ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_con.description: Filter lists tab of the Options page: Generic filter list download error message.

ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_inv.description: Filter lists tab of the Options page: Invalid filter list file.

ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_che.description: Filter lists tab of the Options page: Corrupted filter list file.

invalidListUrl.message: Ongeldige URL voor lijst. Deze zal worden verwijderd.
invalidListUrl.description: Message when you subscribe to a non-list URL

failedtofetchfilter.message: Ophalen van dit filter is mislukt!
failedtofetchfilter.description: Error alert when subscribing to a filter list

removefromlist.description: Label to remove a custom filter list

you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.message: Hoe meer filters u gebruikt, hoe langzamer AdBlock wordt. Te veel filters kunnen uw browser zelfs laten crashen. Klik op OK om u toch op deze lijst te abonneren.
you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to subscribe to too many lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.

unsubscribe_from_all_confirmation.message: AdBlock kan geen advertenties blokkeren als u alle filterlijsten uitschakelt. We raden u aan in plaats daarvan AdBlock te pauzeren. Toch afmelden van deze lijst?
unsubscribe_from_all_confirmation.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to unsubscribe from all filter lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.

filterstabtitle.description: Title of the Filter lists tab of the Options page

filterlistlink.message: Abonneer u niet op meer lijsten dan u nodig hebt - elke lijst zal uw browser iets vertragen! Credits en meer lijsten kunt u [[hier]] vinden.
filterlistlink.description: Filter lists tab explanation and link to filter list credits.

updatenowmessage2.message: Filterlijsten worden automatisch bijgewerkt, maar u kunt ze ook [[nu bijwerken]]

orenteraurl.description: Text box to enter a link to a custom filter list

subscribebutton.description: Subscribe to a filter list button

showlinkstolists2.description: Label to display filter list links

filterannoyances.message: Fanboy’s Annoyances (blokkeert in-pagina-pop-ups, socialemedia- en gerelateerde widgets en andere ergernissen)

filterwarning_removal.message: Adblock Warning Removal list (verwijdert waarschuwingen over het gebruik van adblockers)
filterwarning_removal.description: A filter list. "Adblock" is written with a lowercase B in this string as it refers to ad blocking extensions in general, not just AdBlock specifically.

filterrussian.description: Language names for a filter list

filter_russian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_czech.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_indonesian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_latvian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

blacklistclickmessage.message: Klik met de rechtermuisknop op een advertentie om deze te blokkeren - of blokkeer hem hier handmatig.
blacklistclickmessage.description: 'Hide a section of a webpage' part on the Customize tab of the Options page.

tabcustomizetitle.description: Title of the Customize tab of the Options page

filterlistsrock.message: De filterlijsten blokkeren de meeste advertenties op het web al. U kunt ook:
filterlistsrock.description: Header text on the Customize tab

linkblockadbyurl.message: Een advertentie blokkeren via de URL ervan

linkhidesection.message: Een deel van een webpagina verbergen

linkunblock.message: Advertenties op een webpagina of domein tonen

blockurlwithtext.message: URL’s blokkeren die deze tekst bevatten
blockurlwithtext.description: Message of the URL-blocking section (Block an ad by its URL) on the Customize tab

csstomatch.message: CSS waarop dit moet worden toegepast
csstomatch.description: Message of the CSS-hiding section (Hide a section of a webpage) on the Customize tab

excludedomainorurl.message: Het domein of de URL waarop AdBlock niets moet blokkeren
excludedomainorurl.description: Message of the exclude section (Show ads on a webpage or domain) on the Customize tab

blockdomain.message: Domein van pagina waarop dit moet worden toegepast
blockdomain.description: Message of the URL and CSS blocking sections

manualfilteredit_yt.description: Subtitle on the 'General' tab of AdBlock on YouTube

filtersavewarning.message:
Voorzichtig: als u hier een fout maakt, kunnen de andere filters, waaronder de officiële, ook onbruikbaar worden!
Lees de [[handleiding over filtersyntaxis (Engelstalig)]] voor meer informatie over het maken van filters.

filtersavewarning_ytadblock_1.message: Voorzichtig: als u hier een fout maakt, werkt AdBlock on YouTube™ mogelijk niet meer goed.
filtersavewarning_ytadblock_1.description: First part of the warning when manually editing filters in the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

filtersavewarning_ytadblock_2.message: Lees de [[handleiding over filtersyntaxis]] om te leren hoe u whitelistfilters kunt toevoegen.
filtersavewarning_ytadblock_2.description: Second part of the warning when manually editing filters in the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

migration_error_message.message: We hebben enkele fouten in uw aangepaste filters gevonden. Kijk hieronder voor de berichten.
migration_error_message.description: Error when adding custom filters manually

delete_migration_error_messages.description: Button to delete error messages when adding custom filters manually

contentblockingwarning.message: Opmerking: het whitelisten (toestaan van advertenties) van een pagina of website met Safari-materiaalblokkering geactiveerd wordt niet ondersteund.
contentblockingwarning.description: Notice shown on the 'Customize' tab of the options page when Safari Content Blocking is enabled

adblockreportinganad.description: Title of the ad report page

adreportintro.message: Een advertentie op een webpagina gevonden? We helpen u de juiste plek te vinden om deze te melden!
adreportintro.description: Introduction of the ad reporting page

adreportvoluntary.message: Het melden van advertenties is vrijwillig. Het helpt andere mensen doordat de beheerders van de filters deze advertentie dan voor iedereen kunnen blokkeren. Als u niet het gevoel hebt dat u iemand wilt helpen, is dat OK. Sluit deze pagina en [[blokkeer de advertentie]] dan alleen voor uzelf.
adreportvoluntary.description: Introduction of the ad reporting page

malwarenotificationcheckboxmessage.message: Moet AdBlock u waarschuwen als het malware detecteert?
malwarenotificationcheckboxmessage.description: Checkbox displayed when subscribing to the 'Malware protection' filter list on the Filter lists tab of the Options page

malwarenotificationmessage.message: AdBlock heeft een download van een website die bekend staat om het hosten van malware geblokkeerd.
malwarenotificationmessage.description: Notification when a potential malware request has been blocked. This message should be under 90 characters!

malwarenotificationlearnmore.description: Button on the malware notification that opens a page about malware on the AdBlock website. Message should be under 45 characters!

malwarenotificationdisablethesemessages.description: Button on the malware notification to disable future notifications. Message should be under 45 characters!

malwarecheck.message: Controle op malware die advertenties zou kunnen injecteren:
malwarecheck.description: Section header on the ad report page

malwarewarning.message: Uw computer is mogelijk besmet met malware. Klik [[hier]] voor meer informatie.
malwarewarning.description: On the ad report page, the ads the user is seeing might be caused by malware/adware

malwarenotfound.description: On the ad report page, the ads the user is seeing are probably not caused by malware/adware

disableaa.message: Controleer de filters voor Acceptabele advertenties:
disableaa.description: Section header on the ad report page

aamessageadreport.message: Als u advertenties als deze liever niet ziet, kunt u de filterlijst voor Acceptabele advertenties uitgeschakeld houden.
aamessageadreport.description: Acceptable Ads message on ad report page

aalinkadreport.message: Lees meer over het programma voor Acceptabele advertenties.
aalinkadreport.description: Acceptable Ads link message on ad report page

adreportthanks.description: Message to the user thanking them for sharing the URL with us.

updateyourlists.message: Zorg ervoor dat uw filterlijsten up-to-date zijn:
updateyourlists.description: Section header on the ad report page

reloadadpage.message: Laad de pagina met de advertentie opnieuw.

yes.description: A positive response to a question

no.description: A negative response to a question

adalreadyblocked.description: On the ad report page, telling the user there is nothing to do as the ad they were seeing is now blocked.

clickdisableotherextensions.message: OF, klik gewoon op deze knop om alle bovenstaande handelingen uit te voeren: [[Alle andere extensies uitschakelen]]
clickdisableotherextensions.description: On the ad report page, an alternative way to disable other extensions

disableotherextensionscomplete.message: We hebben alle andere extensies uitgeschakeld. We laden nu de pagina met de advertentie opnieuw. Even geduld.
disableotherextensionscomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've disabled all other extensions

enableotherextensionscomplete.message: De extensies die eerder waren uitgeschakeld, zijn nu weer ingeschakeld.
enableotherextensionscomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've re-enabled extensions that were previously disabled

manuallyenableotherextensions.message: Open de extensiespagina om de eerder uitgeschakelde extensies weer in te schakelen.
manuallyenableotherextensions.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that they will need to manually reenable the extensions

tabreloadcomplete.message: Gereed! We hebben de pagina met de advertentie opnieuw geladen. Controleer deze pagina om te zien of de advertentie is verdwenen. Kom daarna terug naar deze pagina en beantwoord de vraag hieronder.
tabreloadcomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've disabled all other extensions

disableforchromeandsafaristeptwo.message: Vink bij elke extensie het selectievakje ‘Ingeschakeld’ uit, behalve bij AdBlock. Houd AdBlock ingeschakeld.
disableforchromeandsafaristeptwo.description: Step 2 for disabling Chrome and Safari extensions

disableforsafaristepone.message: Klik op het Safari-menu > Voorkeuren > Extensies.

disableforedgestepone.message: Klik op het menu Meer (...) en selecteer Extensies.

disableforedgesteptwo.message: Klik voor elke extensie, behalve voor Adblock, op het tandwielpictogram en klik op de knop Aan om deze naar Uit te wijzigen.

reenableadsonebyone.message: Geweldig! Laten we nu uitzoeken welke extensie de oorzaak is. Controleer elke extensie en schakel deze een voor een in. De extensie die de advertentie(s) terugbrengt, is degene die u moet verwijderen om van de advertenties af te komen.
reenableadsonebyone.description: Tells the user to re-enable the extensions one by one

correctfilters.message: Zorg ervoor dat u de juiste taalfilters gebruikt:
correctfilters.description: On the ad report page, label describing having the right filter lists enabled

pagelanguagecheck.message: In welke taal is die pagina geschreven?

filter_easylist_plus_bulgarian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_chinese.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_dutch.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_french.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_german.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_israeli.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_italian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_romanian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_arabic_plus_french.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_lithuania.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filtereasylist_plus_vietnamese.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_vietnamese.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

nodefaultfilter1.message:
We hebben geen standaard filterlijst voor die taal.
[[Probeer een geschikte lijst te vinden die deze taal ondersteunt]] of blokkeer deze advertentie voor uzelf via het AdBlock-menu.
nodefaultfilter1.description: Instructions on ad report page pointing users to EasyList subscriptions list.

retryaftersubscribe.message: Abonneer u op deze filterlijst en probeer het opnieuw: $list_title$
retryaftersubscribe.description: Instructions on ad report page telling users to subscribe to a filter list and then check again to see whether the ad exists

checkinfirefoxtitle.description: Tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Firefox

checkinfirefoxorchrometitle.description: Tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Firefox/Chrome

checkinfirefox_1.message: Installeer Firefox als u dat niet hebt.
checkinfirefox_1.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad

checkinfirefoxorchrome_1.message: Installeer Firefox of Chrome als u dat niet hebt.
checkinfirefoxorchrome_1.description: instruction for how to check Firefox or Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefox_2.message: Installeer AdBlock Plus voor Firefox als u dat niet hebt.
checkinfirefox_2.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad. Don't translate the name 'Adblock Plus'.

checkinfirefoxorchrome_2.message: Installeer AdBlock Plus voor Firefox of AdBlock voor Chrome als u dat niet hebt.
checkinfirefoxorchrome_2.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad. Don't translate the name 'Adblock Plus'.

checkinfirefox_3.message: Abonneer u in die browser op dezelfde filterlijsten als in deze browser.
checkinfirefox_3.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefox_4.message: Laad de pagina met de advertentie in die browser.
checkinfirefox_4.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefox_5.message: Verschijnt de advertentie ook in die browser?
checkinfirefox_5.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

ff_checkinchrometitle.description: Tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Chrome

ff_checkinchrome_1.message: Installeer Chrome als u dat niet hebt.
ff_checkinchrome_1.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad

ff_checkinchrome_2.message: Installeer AdBlock voor Chrome als u dat niet hebt.
ff_checkinchrome_2.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad

ff_checkinchrome_3.message: Abonneer u in Chrome op dezelfde filterlijsten als in deze browser.
ff_checkinchrome_3.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad

ff_checkinchrome_4.message: Laad de pagina met de advertentie in Chrome.
ff_checkinchrome_4.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad

ff_checkinchrome_5.message: Verschijnt de advertentie ook in Chrome?
ff_checkinchrome_5.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad

refusetocheck.description: User is telling us they don't wish to investigate something for us

reportfilterlistproblem.message: Dit is een probleem met de filterlijst. Meld het hier: $link$
reportfilterlistproblem.description: Telling the user to report an ad to a filter list maintainer

link.example: The link could point to a filter list's forum, or to the email address of a filter list maintainer. For example, forums.lanik.us or someguy@list.com.

fixityourself.message: OK, u kunt deze advertentie alsnog voor uzelf blokkeren op de pagina Opties. Bedankt!
fixityourself.description: Telling users who won't report an ad to us how to handle it for themselves

block_an_ad_on_this_page.message: Een advertentie op deze pagina blokkeren
block_an_ad_on_this_page.description: Toolbar button menu entry and context menu entry

block_this_ad.description: Toolbar button menu entry and context menu entry

close.description: Generic message for buttons that close a view or window

loading.description: Generic message displayed during processes that take some time

flashads.description: Title of the final ad report question if the ad didn't appear in Firefox

cantblockflashwarning.message: Verschijnt de advertentie in of voor een film of andere plug-in, zoals een Flash-spel?
cantblockflashwarning.description: Text of the final ad report question

cantblockflash.message: We kunnen nog geen advertenties in Flash of andere plug-ins blokkeren. We wachten op ondersteuning van de browser en WebKit.
cantblockflash.description: Result of the final ad report question

cleanuplist2.description: Label at the bottom of the 'Customize' tab of the Options page

disabled_by_filter_lists.message: Sorry, AdBlock is op deze pagina uitgeschakeld door een van uw filterlijsten.
disabled_by_filter_lists.description: Message shown when a user tries to unwhitelist a web page that has been whitelisted by a rule in a subscribed filter list.

disabled_by_filter_lists_yt.message: Sorry, AdBlock on YouTube is op deze pagina uitgeschakeld door een van uw opties.
disabled_by_filter_lists_yt.description: Message shown when a user tries to un-whitelist a web page that has been whitelisted by a rule in a subscribed filter list. Specific to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.message: Niets op pagina’s van dit domein blokkeren
dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.description: Menu entry to open the whitelist wizard

dont_run_on_pages_on_site.message: Niets op pagina’s van deze website blokkeren
dont_run_on_pages_on_site.description: Menu entry to open the whitelist wizard

disabled_on_this_page.message: AdBlock is op deze pagina uitgeschakeld.
disabled_on_this_page.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that have been whitelisted

disabled_on_this_channel.message: U hebt advertenties op dit kanaal toegestaan.
disabled_on_this_channel.description: Message shown in the toolbar button menu on YouTube channel pages and videos that have been whitelisted.

enable_adblock.description: Link text to un-whitelist a page, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is disabled on this page'

enable_adblock_on_this_channel.description: Menu entry to un-whitelist a YouTube channel, displayed under 'You allowed ads on this channel.'

status_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when AdBlock is not running

status_universal_paused.message: AdBlock is op alle websites gepauzeerd.
status_universal_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when AdBlock is not running on all domains

status_domain_paused.message: AdBlock is op deze website gepauzeerd.
status_domain_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when AdBlock is not running on a specific domain

resume_blocking_ads.description: Link text to start blocking ads again, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is paused on this site' or 'AdBlock is paused on all sites'

unpause_adblock.description: Link text to start blocking ads again, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is paused'

domain_unpause_adblock.description: Link text to start blocking ads again, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is paused on this site'

pause_adblock.description: Menu entry to pause AdBlock (stop blocking ads)

pause_adblock_everywhere.description: Menu entry to pause AdBlock everywhere (stop blocking ads)

domain_pause_adblock.description: Menu entry to pause AdBlock on this domain (stop blocking ads)

unpause_adblocking.description: Menu entry to unpause the extension (start blocking ads again)

pause_adblocking.description: Menu entry to pause the extension (stop blocking ads)

safaricontentblockingpausemessage.message: AdBlock pauzeren met Materiaalblokkering ingeschakeld: selecteer Safari (in de menubalk) > Voorkeuren > Extensies > AdBlock en vink ‘AdBlock inschakelen’ uit.
safaricontentblockingpausemessage.description: Alert displayed after clicking 'Pause AdBlock' in the AdBlock menu while Safari Content blocking is enabled.

safaricontentblockinglimitexceeded.message: Het aantal regels in de filterlijst overschrijft de limiet van 50.000 en is automatisch verkleind. Meld u af voor enkele filterlijsten of schakel Materiaalblokkering in Safari uit!
safaricontentblockinglimitexceeded.description: Displayed when the number of rules in the subscribed filter lists is larger than the number supported by Safari Content Blocking, if that option is enabled.

browserestartrequired.message: Herstart Safari om materiaalblokkering volledig uit te schakelen.
browserestartrequired.description: Displayed after disabling Safari Content Blocking, which requres a browser relaunch.

safarinotificationtitle.description: Title of a notification shown to Safari Content Blocking users with too many filter list rules.

safarinotificationbody.message: Schakel enkele filterlijsten uit. Meer informatie in de AdBlock-opties.
safarinotificationbody.description: Body of a notification shown to Safari Content Blocking users with too many filter list rules.

undo_last_block.message: Mijn blokkeringen op dit domein ongedaan maken
undo_last_block.description: Menu entry to let the user cancel the result of running the blacklist wizard.

undo_last_block_site.message: Mijn blokkeringen op deze website ongedaan maken
undo_last_block_site.description: Menu entry to let the user cancel the result of running the blacklist wizard.

dont_run_on_this_page.description: Menu entry to whitelist the current page

options.description: The text of the link on chrome://chrome/extensions that takes you to the Options page

hide_this_button.description: Toolbar button menu entry to hide the AdBlock button

donate_to_adblock.description: Text of a donate link in the toolbar button menu

help_and_feedback.description: Text of a help link in the toolbar button menu

donate_to_youtube_adblock.message: Bevalt AdBlock on YouTube? Overweeg een donatie!
donate_to_youtube_adblock.description: Text of a donate link in the toolbar button menu. 'This' refers to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

pwyw.description: Text of a payment request link

translator_credit.description: This message will be followed by a list of names of the translators who contributed to the language AdBlock is currently displayed in. Do not add any names to this string.

tabsupport.description: A tab on the Options page

tabtranslations.description: A tab on the Options page

translators.message: Lees [[hier]] meer over hoe u kunt helpen met het vertalen van AdBlock.
translators.description: A link on the Options page / translators tab to a KB article about how to help translate AdBlock

report_ad_on_page.message: Een advertentie op deze pagina melden
report_ad_on_page.description: Entry in the AdBlock button menu

acceptableadsoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page to enable the Acceptable Ads filter list

advanced_options2.message: Ik ben een gevorderde gebruiker; geavanceerde opties tonen
advanced_options2.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

work_around_hulu_problems.message: Problemen met video’s op Hulu.com omzeilen (vereist opnieuw opstarten van uw browser)
work_around_hulu_problems.description: Advanced Options page checkbox, which users only need to use if Hulu.com videos break. It directs the user to restart their browser in order for changes to the checkbox to take effect.

modifydomain.description: Caption for the whitelist wizard slider that modifies the domain part of a URL

modifypath.description: Caption for the whitelist wizard slider that modifies the path part of a URL

show_ads_except_for.message: Overal advertenties tonen, behalve op deze domeinen...
show_ads_except_for.description: Section title for the whitelisting section of Customize tab

only_block_ads_on_these_sites.message: Alleen advertenties op deze websites blokkeren:
only_block_ads_on_these_sites.description: Label for textbox where user enters a list of sites on Customize tab

format_site1_site2_site3.description: Example showing users how to input a list of sites on the Customize tab. You can translate the 'news' and 'siteN' but leave the '|'s and '~'s in place.

warning_overrules_filters.message:
Waarschuwing: op alle andere websites zult u advertenties zien!
Dit heeft voorrang op alle andere filters voor die websites.
warning_overrules_filters.description: Message on the 'Customize' tab of the options page, explaining the danger of adding a whitelist filter for all websites with only some exceptions.

storage_quota_exceeded.message: U gebruikt meer opslagruimte dan AdBlock kan gebruiken. Meld u af voor enkele filterlijsten!
storage_quota_exceeded.description: Message shown when the user uses more storage than allowed by the browser.

safari50_updatenotice.message: U gebruikt een verouderde versie van Safari. Download de nieuwste versie om de AdBlock-werkbalkknop te kunnen gebruiken voor het pauzeren van AdBlock, whitelisten van websites en het melden van advertenties. [[Upgrade nu]].
safari50_updatenotice.description: A message shown to Safari 5.0 users urging them to upgrade

firefox_explanation.message: Het doel van deze vraag is om te bepalen wie uw rapport moet ontvangen. Als u deze vraag onjuist beantwoordt, wordt de melding naar de verkeerde persoon gestuurd en daardoor mogelijk genegeerd.
firefox_explanation.description: Explanation of the 'Check in Firefox or Chrome' step on the ad report page

blocked_ads.description: Title for toolbar icon menu section showing number of ads blocked

blocked_n_on_this_page.description: Shown below the 'Blocked ads:' message. Shows the number of ads blocked on this page. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999.

blocked_n_in_total.description: Shown below the 'Blocked ads:' message. Shows the number of ads blocked since AdBlock was installed. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999,999,999.

show_on_adblock_button.message: Aantal geblokkeerde advertenties op AdBlock-knop tonen
show_on_adblock_button.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the toolbar button should show a badge with the number of ads blocked

show_on_adblock_menu.message: Aantal geblokkeerde advertenties in AdBlock-menu tonen
show_on_adblock_menu.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the AdBlock menu should show the number of ads blocked

show_on_button.message: Aantal geblokkeerde advertenties op knop tonen
show_on_button.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the toolbar button should show a badge with the number of ads blocked

show_on_menu.message: Aantal geblokkeerde advertenties in menu tonen
show_on_menu.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the AdBlock menu should show the number of ads blocked

block_ads_on_youtube.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether to block ads on youtube.com

block_privacy_on_youtube.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether to block privacy-related requests on youtube.com

block_annonyances_on_youtube.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether to block annonyances on youtube.com (such as comments, suggested videos, annotations, and recommended channels)

show_devtools_panel.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the AdBlock tab should be displayed in the developer tools window

adblockinglist.description: Subtitle on the Filter lists tab: List of filter lists to block ads.

otherfilters.description: Subtitle on the Filter lists tab: List of filter lists to block other elements that are not ads.

customfilters.description: Subtitle on the Filter lists tab: Section for adding your own filter lists.

customfilterserrormessage.message:
Het volgende filter:
 $filter$ 
 bevat een fout: 
 $message$
customfilterserrormessage.description: Error message when there is an issue with a custom filter on the 'Customize' tab of the Options page

languagedropdowndescription.message: Filters voor een andere taal toevoegen:
languagedropdowndescription.description: Dropdown list for language-specific filter lists

how.description: Text of a link pointing to instructions on how to do something

whats_this.description: Text of a link pointing to the explanation of a new feature

selectlanguage.description: First option in the language dropdown menu on the Filter lists tab. Include the ' -- ' on either side of your translation.

allow_whitelisting_youtube_channels.message: Uitsluiten van specifieke YouTube™-kanalen toestaan (vereist opnieuw opstarten van uw browser)
allow_whitelisting_youtube_channels.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

whitelist_all_youtube_channels.description: Toolbar button menu entry, displayed only on youtube.com/feed/subscriptions and if the YouTube channel whitelisting option is enabled.

one_moment_all_youtube_channels.message: Even geduld, al uw abonnementen worden verzameld
one_moment_all_youtube_channels.description: Alert displayed when whitelisting all subscribed YouTube channels

all_youtube_channels_complete.description: Alert displayed after the whitelisting of all subscribed YouTube channels has been completed

allow_ads_all_youtube_channels.message: Advertenties op alle geabonneerde YouTube™-kanalen toestaan
allow_ads_all_youtube_channels.description: Toolbar button menu entry, displayed only on youtube.com/feed/subscriptions and if the YouTube channel whitelisting option is enabled

whitelist_youtube_channel.description: Entry in the AdBlock menu, only displayed when a user is browsing YouTube and has enabled the YouTube channel whitelisting option

whitelist_youtube_channel_v2.description: Menu entry to whitelist the channel of the current YouTube video or page. The channel name will appear on a line below this menu item.

confirm_undo_custom_filters.message: Weet u zeker dat u de $count$ blokkeringen die u op $host$ hebt aangemaakt wilt verwijderen?
confirm_undo_custom_filters.description: Confirmation message when user wants to undo their custom blocks for a domain. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999,999,999, $host$ will be the domain where the custom blocks will be reset.

here.description: This message is injected in other strings as a link/button

adblocksupport.description: Title of the Support tab of the Options page

whatsnew.message: Wat is er nieuw in de meest recente versie? Bekijk de [[changelog]]!
whatsnew.description: Link to display the changelog on the Support tab

englishonly.description: Lets the user know that a link/page is only available in English.

ytadblockupdates.description: Subtitle on the Support tab. Specific to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

whatmakesadblocktick.message: Wilt u zien hoe AdBlock werkt?
whatmakesadblocktick.description: Subtitle on the Support tab. This section contains links to the AdBlock source code and contributors. In this context, 'tick' can be replaced with the word 'work'.

questionoridea.message: Hebt u een vraag of een nieuw idee?

sourcecode.description: Link to the source code of AdBlock on the Support tab

contributors.message: We hebben ook een pagina die toont [[wie er allemaal achter AdBlock zitten]]!
contributors.description: Link to the contributors page on the Support tab

debuginfo.message: Heeft ons team om debuginfo gevraagd? Klik dan [[hier]]!
debuginfo.description: Users can click this link to provide debug information to AdBlock staff

bugreport.description: Link to send a bug report on the Support tab

supportsite.message: Laat het ons weten op onze [[ondersteuningswebsite]]!
supportsite.description: Link to the support site on the Support tab

ad_report_please.message: Als u een advertentie ziet, maak dan geen bugrapport, maar een [[advertentierapport]]!
ad_report_please.description: Link to the ad report page on AdBlock's help site. This is found on the Support tab of the options.

headerresource.description: Resource list page: title of a column

headertype.description: Resource list page: title of a column

headerfilter.description: Resource list page: title of a column

show_resourcelist.description: Menu entry to open the resource list page

new_resourcelist_explanation_win.message: Alle aanvragen tonen: klik met de rechtermuisknop op de pagina, selecteer ‘Inspecteren’ (Ctrl+Shift+I) en selecteer daarna het tabblad ‘AdBlock’.
new_resourcelist_explanation_win.description: Message explaining how to access the resource list page on AdBlock 3.0+ (Windows)

new_resourcelist_explanation_osx.message: Alle aanvragen tonen: klik met de rechtermuisknop op de pagina, selecteer ‘Inspecteren’ (Option+Cmd+I) en selecteer daarna het tabblad ‘AdBlock’.
new_resourcelist_explanation_osx.description: Message explaining how to access the resource list page on AdBlock 3.0+ (Mac)

noresourcessend2.message: Er is iets fout gegaan. Er zijn geen bronnen doorgestuurd. Deze pagina wordt nu gesloten. Probeer de webpagina opnieuw te laden.

resourcedomain.description: Resource list page: text shown when hovering over an item in the third-party column

filterorigin.description: Resource list page: tooltip of matching filter, telling which filter list contains the filter

list.example: A filter list name OR AdBlock OR the translation of 'tabcustomize'

frametype.description: Resource list page: followed by frame type (top frame, subframe)

framedomain.description: Resource list page: domain name of the frame

frameurl.description: Resource list page: full URL of the frame

legend.description: Resource list page: followed by color codes for various resource statuses (blocked, whitelisted, hidden)

thirdparty.description: Resource list page: column title telling if the resource originates from a different domain

acceptableadsdisable_done.message: U bent niet meer op de filterlijst voor Acceptabele advertenties geabonneerd.
acceptableadsdisable_done.description: Message shown to users after disabling Acceptable Ads via the Options page.

acceptableadsdisable_how_to_reenable.message: U kunt dit weer inschakelen en de websites die u vaak bezoekt steunen door hieronder ‘Enkele niet-opdringerige advertenties toestaan’ te selecteren.
acceptableadsdisable_how_to_reenable.description: Message shown to users after disabling Acceptable Ads via the Options page.

easylist_lite_or_easylist.message: We raden aan om u te abonneren op ‘EasyList Lite’ of ‘EasyList’, maar niet op allebei tegelijk.
easylist_lite_or_easylist.description: Message shown to users after disabling both EasyList Lite and EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.

easylist_disable_done.message: AdBlock gebruikt EasyList om advertenties op de meeste websites te blokkeren.
easylist_disable_done.description: Message shown to users after disabling EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.

easylist_disable_how_to_reenable.message: We raden aan dit ingeschakeld te houden. Als u zich per ongeluk hebt afgemeld, selecteer dan nu ‘EasyList’ om meer advertenties te blokkeren.
easylist_disable_how_to_reenable.description: Message shown to users after disabling EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.

easylist_lite_disable_done.message: AdBlock gebruikt EasyList Lite of EasyList om advertenties op de meeste websites te blokkeren.
easylist_lite_disable_done.description: Message shown to users after disabling both EasyList Lite and EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.

easylist_lite_disable_how_to_reenable.message: We raden aan dit ingeschakeld te houden. Als u zich per ongeluk hebt afgemeld, selecteer dan nu ‘EaseList Lite’ of ‘EasyList’ om meer advertenties te blokkeren.
easylist_lite_disable_how_to_reenable.description: Message shown to users after disabling both EasyList Lite and EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.

acceptable_ads_content_blocking_disbled_.message: We hebben u afgemeld voor Acceptabele advertenties, omdat u Materiaalblokkering in Safari hebt ingeschakeld. U kunt maar 1 van deze 2 opties tegelijk selecteren. ([[Waarom?]])
acceptable_ads_content_blocking_disbled_.description: Warning shown when Safari Content Blocking is enabled while the Acceptable Ads filter list was already enabled.

content_blocking_acceptable_ads_disbled_.message: We hebben Materiaalblokkering in Safari uitgeschakeld, omdat u ervoor hebt gekozen om niet-opdringerige advertenties toe te staan. U kunt maar 1 van deze 2 opties tegelijk selecteren. ([[Waarom?]])
content_blocking_acceptable_ads_disbled_.description: Warning shown when the Acceptable Ads filter list is enabled while Safari Content Blocking was already enabled.

adreport_laststep.message: Laatste stap: meld het probleem bij ons.
adreport_laststep.description: Subtitle on the ad report page. Shown when the ad needs to be reported to AdBlock, and not filter list maintainers.

adreport_name.description: Label for a textbox where the user enters their name (or nickname) to submit a bug or ad report.

adreport_email.description: Label for a textbox where the user enters their email address to submit a bug or ad report.

adreport_email_privacy.message: We gebruiken dit alleen om contact op te nemen als we meer informatie nodig hebben.
adreport_email_privacy.description: Let the user know that their email address won't be used for reasons other than contacting them about their bug or ad report.

adreport_location.message: Waar precies op de pagina bevindt de advertentie zich? Hoe ziet hij eruit?
adreport_location.description: Question on the ad report page asking the user to describe the ad and its location on a webpage.

adreport_screen_cap_upload.description: Label next to a file upload button.

adreport_filter.message: Als u een werkend filter hebt kunnen maken met de wizard ‘Een advertentie blokkeren’, kopieer dit dan in het vak hieronder:
adreport_filter.description: Optional question on the ad report page when the ad needs to be reported to AdBlock.

adreport_missing_info.message: Vereiste informatie ontbreekt of is ongeldig. Vul alle vragen in die rood zijn omlijnd.
adreport_missing_info.description: Error message shown when the user doesn't enter anything in some of the text fields.

adreport_missing_screenshot.message: U bent vergeten een schermafbeelding toe te voegen! We kunnen u niet helpen zonder dat we de advertentie(s) zien die u wilt melden.
adreport_missing_screenshot.description: Error message shown when the user doesn't attach a screenshot to an ad report.

adreport_response_success.message: Klaar! We zullen zo snel mogelijk contact met u opnemen. Intussen kunt u kijken of u al een e-mail van AdBlock hebt ontvangen. Daarin vindt u een koppeling naar uw hulpvraag op onze ondersteuningswebsite, samen met een aantal zelfhulpsuggesties voor als we niet meteen kunnen reageren.
adreport_response_success.description: Shown when a ticket has been sumbitted to AdBlock's support site successfully.

adreport_response_invalid_file.message: Dit is geen afbeeldingsbestand. Upload een .png-, .gif- of .jpg-bestand.
adreport_response_invalid_file.description: Error message shown when the user uploads an invalid file type.

adreport_response_large_file.message: Dit bestand is te groot. Zorg ervoor dat het bestand minder dan 10 MB groot is.
adreport_response_large_file.description: Error message shown when the user tries to upload a large image file.

adreport_response_save_error.message: Fout bij opslaan van het geüploade bestand.
adreport_response_save_error.description: Error message shown when the server could not save an attached file.

adreport_response_file_name.message: Deze bestandsnaam is te lang. Geef uw bestand een kortere naam.
adreport_response_file_name.description: Error message shown when the file name of an attachement the user is trying to submit in a report is longer than 255 characters.

adreport_all_debug_info.message: De volgende informatie zal ook in het advertentierapport worden opgenomen.
adreport_all_debug_info.description: Shows the user the debug information that will be sent along with their report.

adreport_server_response_error_msg.message: Er is een fout opgetreden bij de verwerking van uw aanvraag.
adreport_server_response_error_msg.description: Error message shown when an new ticket is sumbitted for an ad or bug report, and the server had an issue while processing the data.

adreport_server_response_error__manual_m.description: Error message shown when the server has an unrecoverable error during the submission of an ad or bug report.

adreport_server_response_error__manual_m.message: Maak handmatig een ticket aan, en kopieer en plak de onderstaande gegevens in de sectie ‘Fill in any details you think will help us understand your issue’.
adreport_server_response_error__manual_m.description: Error message shown when the server has an unrecoverable error during the submission of an ad or bug report.

custom_filters_migration_error_message_p.description: Part one of a message shown to users on the Customize tab of the Options page after invalid custom filters have been migrated

custom_filters_migration_error_message_p.message: De volgende berichten zijn tijdens de migratie van aangepaste filters gegenereerd (negeer de regelnummers):
custom_filters_migration_error_message_p.description: Part two of a message shown to users on the Customize tab of the Options page after invalid custom filters have been migrated
Part three of a message shown to users on the Customize tab of the Options page after invalid custom filters have been migrated

show_language_options.message: Mij de weergavetaal van AdBlock laten kiezen
show_language_options.description: Option to let the user choose AdBlock's display language.

display_language_selector.description: Text shown before language selector drop-down.

local_cdn_option.message: Bufferen van lokale inhoud voor bibliotheken van populaire websites inschakelen
local_cdn_option.description: Option to let the user enable Local CDN feature.

myadblockoptions.description: The text of the menu item in the popup menu that takes you to the MyAdBlock Options page

newmyadblockenrollment.description: The text of the 'Enable MyAdBlock' menu item in the popup menu that takes you to the MyAdBlock Enrollment page

myadblockenrollment.description: The text of the menu item in the popup menu that takes you to the MyAdBlock Enrollment page

myadblockoptionspageheader.description: The text of the header the MyAdBlock Options page

myadblockoptionscategoryheader.description: The text of the header the MyAdBlock Options page

myadblockpicreplacementswitchlabel.message: Enkele geblokkeerde advertenties vervangen door afbeeldingen van hoge kwaliteit uit de onderstaande categorieën
myadblockpicreplacementswitchlabel.description: The label text for the switch on the MyAdBlock Options page

catchannelswitchlabel.description: The label text for the cat switch on the MyAdBlock Options page

dogchannelswitchlabel.description: The label text for the dog switch on the MyAdBlock Options page

landscapechannelswitchlabel.description: The label text for the Landscape switch on the MyAdBlock Options page

mac_app_message_options.message: AdBlock voor Safari is nu beschikbaar als een Mac-app!
mac_app_message_options.description: Message to users on the Options page

mac_app_message_menu_part_one.description: part one of the message to safari users on the popup menu

mac_app_message_menu_part_two.description: part two of the message to safari users on the popup menu
